scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:local: npx concurrently "npm run dev:backend:integrated" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend:integrated: cd backend && PORT=5001 npm run dev:integrated
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=frontend && npm install --workspace=backend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
